transform_def.name: designed31
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = tan(abs(p_in.x) + abs(p_in.y)) t = tan(abs(p_in.x + p_in.y) + abs(p_in.x - p_in.y)) u = lerp(s, t, length(p_in) / 2.0) * r v = atan2(u / quartpi(), u * (u / halfinvpi())) z = if r > twoinvpi() then p_in.x + sign(p_in.y) else v con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
